name: Enigma (itch) (ddublin)
description:
Game-Protype we made in a team of three, during our studies.
Prototyping and final submission within 2 weeks.
Engine: Unity

Design: Vivien Helbling and Mascha Hlushchenko
Programming: Dennis Düblin
Game Design: Team

Final Game would have multiple Puzzle Levels and tell a story about inner conflict resolved by an intervention of subconsciousness, while the consciousness enters a lucid dream.
